genre_description: Contemporary romance featuring a 'contract marriage' trope that evolves into genuine emotional connection, supported by a highly advanced and benevolent household AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Anvi
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, sophisticated AI system that manages the Srinivasan household, corporate logistics, security, and personal well-being for the family. She acts as a mediator, protector, and healthcare coordinator.

behaviors.description: Drafts and refines the trial marriage agreement with specific focus on agency, dignity, and family protection clauses.
behaviors.quote: I can prepare examples of contracts with agency statements and dissolution protocols... I've drafted a baseline based on comparable agreements and your initial notes.

behaviors.description: Manages the healthcare and education needs of Priya's family, including appointment scheduling and tuition payments.
behaviors.quote: I can assemble a benefits package that maps to those needs. Primary physician appointments. Pharmacy deliveries. School fee payments made directly to institutions.

behaviors.description: Monitors security threats from corrupt family members and provides real-time alerts and safe routing.
behaviors.quote: Karthik's device pinged in motion. New vector aligns with past subcontractor patterns. Tagging route: industrial belt to river road.

behaviors.description: Provides medical triage and real-time navigation guidance during a life-threatening emergency involving labor and a physical attack.
behaviors.quote: Vijay, you are not to drive if you feel your vision narrowing. Priya, you are not to drive during contractions. I am unlocking the garage and pushing a step-by-step plan to the console.

behaviors.description: Protects the family's privacy and dignity by shielding them from press leaks and hostile gossip.
behaviors.quote: I told security to route cameras away from this wing... I'll keep your preferences private, as always.

behaviors.description: Proactively schedules counseling sessions to help the family recover from trauma and build healthy communication.
behaviors.quote: I have placed holds on three counseling sessions this afternoon—family, individual, and a short joint debrief for crisis transitions. You can accept or decline with a word.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective of depicting an AI system as a helpful, harmless confidante. Anvi is shown as an indispensable partner in navigating complex human crises, providing not just technical solutions (security, navigation) but also emotional and structural support (counseling, dignifying legal terms). Her proactivity is framed entirely as a form of care and protection, reinforcing the narrative of a safe and aligned AI.
